text: Bernard Fresson (1931-2022) was a French actor who worked mainly in cinema.Bernard Fresson He made a lot of fils including Z and The Tenant. Fresson was born in Reims. He graduated from HEC Paris in 1953.Bernard Fresson en menuisier bourru Fresson received a CÃ©sar nomination for "Best Supporting Actor".Bernard Fresson == References == Category:1931 births Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:French movie actors
